snippet: Senators John McCain and Lindsey Graham made the trip to Cairo at the request of President Obama.
abstract: Republicans Sen Lindsey Graham and Sen John McCain warn Egypt, during visit there at request of Pres Obama, that United States will cut off aid to country if military-appointed government fails to move rapidly toward democracy; both men have argued that ouster of Pres Mohamed Morsi should be considered coup.
lead_paragraph: Senators John McCain and Lindsey Graham made the trip to Cairo at the request of President Obama.

headline.main: 2 Senators Visit Egypt With Threat on U.S. Aid
headline.print_headline: 2 Senators Visit Egypt With Threat On U.S. Aid

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
